Text: Fuck your multi-part-archive bullshit. You know that when you compress an already-compressed video stream it comes out larger, right? This one here: https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6598633/Futurama.S06E22.720p.HDTV.x264-IMMERSE is NOT in a multipart RAR and it's smaller. And don't give me the "it's for integrity checking" bullshit either. That shit might fly on Usenet, but Bittorrent hashes each chunk separately, regardless.
